segments.text: I feel a sense of unease looking at this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is creating a hazardous puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried someone might slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy standing on the stool is risking injury, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel anxious watching him reach for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting for a cookie is standing too close to the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees the hazards soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is filled with potential accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake this feeling of apprehension.
segments.speaker: PAR
